solution.text:
Surface Area = Curved surface area of outer cylinder + Curved surface area of inner cylinder + Area of both rims
\(= 2\pi {r_ o}h + 2\pi {r_ i}h + 2 (\pi {r_ o}^2 - \pi {r_ i}^2)\)
\(= _{{trunc( (2*pi_val*(j+2)*k) + (2*pi_val*j*k) + (2*pi_val*(((j+2)**2) - (j**2))), 2 )}}_ cm^2\)

content.text: In the same hollow cylinder, with Inner Radius =_{j}_ cm, Outer Radius = _{{j+2}}_ cm, Height = _{k}_ cm, find its surface area
